caption: Fra Angelico’s Annunciation (mid-1430s)
description: Early Renaissance masterpiece depicting the Archangel Gabriel announcing to Mary that she will bear the Son of God, featuring delicate colors and serene architectural setting.
subject: Biblical Annunciation scene with Archangel Gabriel and Virgin Mary
title: The Annunciation

caption: Rembrandt's The Visitation
description: Rembrandt's intimate portrayal of Mary visiting Elizabeth, showcasing dramatic chiaroscuro and emotional depth in this biblical encounter.
subject: Meeting between Virgin Mary and her cousin Elizabeth
title: The Visitation

caption: Giovanni Antonio Pellegrini's The Nativity
description: Rococo interpretation of Christ's birth featuring theatrical composition, vibrant colors, and emotional emphasis on the holy family.
subject: Birth of Jesus Christ in Bethlehem
title: The Nativity

caption: Fresco of Presentation in the Temple in Chiesa di Santa Rita by Giulio Campi (1547)
description: Mannerist fresco depicting Mary and Joseph presenting the infant Jesus to Simeon in the Temple, featuring elegant figures and classical architecture.
location: Chiesa di Santa Rita, Cremona, Italy
mystery_name: The Presentation of Jesus in the Temple
subject: Presentation of infant Jesus at the Temple in Jerusalem
title: The Presentation of Jesus in the Temple

caption: Finding of Jesus in the Temple mosaic from Lourdes Basilica, France
description: Byzantine-style mosaic showing Mary and Joseph finding young Jesus teaching in the Temple, with golden background and solemn figures.
mystery_name: The Finding of Jesus in the Temple
subject: Twelve-year-old Jesus discussing with temple teachers
title: The Finding of Jesus in the Temple

caption: An unknown artist’s fresco, Baptism of Christ, in Padua’s church of San Benedetto
description: Late Gothic fresco depicting John baptizing Jesus in the Jordan River, with Holy Spirit descending as dove and God the Father above.
location: Church of San Benedetto Vecchio, Padua, Italy
mystery_name: The Baptism of Jesus in the Jordan
subject: Baptism of Jesus by John the Baptist in Jordan River
title: The Baptism of Christ

caption: Carl Bloch’s The Wedding at Cana
description: Realist portrayal of Jesus performing his first miracle at a wedding feast, capturing the moment of transformation with dramatic lighting.
subject: Christ's first miracle turning water into wine
title: The Wedding at Cana

caption: James Tissot’s Healing of the Lepers at Capernaum
description: Tissot's detailed biblical illustration showing Jesus healing ten lepers, emphasizing historical accuracy and Middle Eastern setting.
mystery_name: The Proclamation of the Kingdom of God
subject: Christ healing ten lepers in Capernaum
title: Healing of the Lepers at Capernaum

caption: Transfiguration in Vienna’s Votive Church
description: Academic style altarpiece depicting Christ transfigured in divine light with Moses, Elijah, and astonished apostles Peter, James, and John.
subject: Transfiguration of Christ on Mount Tabor
title: The Transfiguration

caption: Giacomo Raffaelli (1753-1836) , an Italian mosaicist, created a life-sized mosaic copy of Leonardo da Vinci's The Last Supper
description: Masterful mosaic reproduction of Leonardo's masterpiece showing Christ announcing his betrayal during the Last Supper meal.
subject: Christ's last meal with apostles instituting Eucharist
title: The Last Supper

caption: Agony in the Garden by Vicente Masip, also known as Vicente Juan Masip
description: Christ kneels in prayer at Gethsemane while angels bring him the chalice of suffering and his disciples sleep nearby.
subject: Christ praying in Gethsemane while disciples sleep
title: Agony in the Garden

caption: Giovanni Antonio Bazzi known as Sodoma, Christ at the Column (c. 1510-1515; detached fresco, 140 x 101 cm; Siena, Pinacoteca Nazionale)
description: Christ is shown tied to a column, his body marked with wounds from the scourging, displaying both suffering and spiritual strength.
subject: Christ bound to the column during his scourging
title: Christ at the Column

caption: Titian's Christ Crowned with Thorns (c. 1542–1543)
description: Soldiers press the thorny crown onto Christ's head as he endures this humiliation with divine patience and dignity.
subject: Roman soldiers mockingly crown Christ with thorns
title: Christ Crowned with Thorns

caption: Pieter Bruegel the Elder's The Procession to Calvary (1564)
description: A panoramic view of Christ's journey to crucifixion, blending biblical narrative with detailed Flemish landscape and daily life.
subject: Christ carrying his cross amid a vast crowd to Golgotha
title: The Procession to Calvary

caption: The fresco of Crucifixion in the church San Girolamo dei Croati by Pietro Gagliardi (1847-1852)
description: Christ hangs on the cross with Mary and John at his feet, conveying the ultimate sacrifice for humanity's salvation.
location: Chiesa di San Girolamo dei Croati, Rome, Italy
subject: Christ crucified between two thieves on Calvary
title: Crucifixion

caption: Resurrection (1593) by Annibale Carracci
description: Christ emerges gloriously from the tomb, holding the banner of victory as astonished soldiers recoil in awe.
subject: Christ triumphantly rising from the tomb
title: Resurrection

caption: Crossing (Ascension) cupola 1175-1200 Mosaic Basilica di San Marco (Cupola of St. Mark), Venice
description: Christ rises majestically into heaven while the Virgin and apostles gaze upward in wonder at this divine event.
location: Basilica di San Marco, Venice, Italy
subject: Christ ascending into heaven surrounded by angels
title: Ascension Cupola

caption: Pentecost by Jean Restout II (1692–1768)
description: Flames descend upon Mary and the apostles as the Holy Spirit empowers them for their mission to evangelize.
mystery_name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
subject: The Holy Spirit descending upon Mary and the apostles
title: Pentecost

caption: The Assumption of Virgin Mary in the main cupola in Chiesa di Santa Maria del Orto by Giuseppe and Andrea Orazi 1706
description: Mary rises triumphantly to heaven surrounded by angels while apostles marvel at her empty tomb below.
location: Chiesa di Santa Maria del Orto, Rome, Italy
subject: Virgin Mary being assumed body and soul into heaven
title: Assumption of the Virgin

caption: Coronation of the Virgin, a painting on oil on canvas by Diego Velázquez of the Holy Trinity crowning the Blessed Virgin Mary, at the Museo del Prado
description: God the Father and Son place a celestial crown upon Mary's head as the Holy Spirit descends upon her.
subject: The Holy Trinity crowning Mary as Queen of Heaven
title: Coronation of the Virgin

caption: The Annunciation, an 1898 painting by African-American painter Henry Ossawa Tanner
description: Tanner's groundbreaking depiction of the Annunciation shows Mary as a humble Semitic girl illuminated by divine golden light representing Gabriel.
subject: Annunciation to the Virgin Mary
title: The Annunciation

caption: The painting of Visitation in the church Chiesa dei Santi Severino e Sossio by Federico Maldarelli (1889)
description: Maldarelli's academic style depicts the pregnant Mary visiting her cousin Elizabeth, with both women recognizing the divine significance of their children.
location: Chiesa dei Santi Severino e Sossio, Naples
subject: Visitation of Mary to Elizabeth
title: The Visitation

caption: Gerard van Honthorst - Adoration of the Shepherds (1622)
description: Van Honthorst's Caravaggesque masterpiece uses dramatic chiaroscuro to illuminate the humble shepherds adoring the newborn Christ in a stable.
subject: Adoration of the Christ Child by shepherds
title: Adoration of the Shepherds

caption: The painting of Presentation of Jesus in the Temple in church kostel Svatého Havla by unknown baroque artist
description: Baroque depiction of Mary and Joseph presenting the infant Jesus to Simeon in the Temple, fulfilling Jewish purification laws.
location: Church of St. Gall (kostel Svatého Havla), Prague
mystery_name: The Presentation of Jesus in the Temple
subject: Presentation of infant Jesus in the Temple
title: Presentation of Jesus in the Temple

caption: Jesus, at 12, teaching in the Temple
description: Depiction of the adolescent Jesus astonishing Temple scholars with his wisdom during the Passover pilgrimage to Jerusalem.
mystery_name: The Finding of Jesus in the Temple
subject: Twelve-year-old Jesus teaching in the Temple
title: Christ Among the Doctors

artist: Andrea del Verrocchio and Leonardo da Vinci
caption: The Baptism of Christ by Leonardo Da Vinci created in the studio of Andrea del Verrochio around 1475
description: Collaborative work showing John baptizing Jesus in the Jordan River, with Leonardo's angel demonstrating his emerging revolutionary style.
mystery_name: The Baptism of Jesus in the Jordan
subject: Baptism of Jesus by John the Baptist
title: The Baptism of Christ

caption: Gerard David's The Marriage at Cana
description: Early Netherlandish depiction of Christ's first miracle, turning water into wine at a wedding feast in Cana.
subject: Wedding at Cana and Christ's first miracle
title: The Marriage at Cana

caption: The Adulterous Woman by Lorenzo Lotto
description: Lotto's painting captures the moment Christ challenges accusers with "Let he who is without sin cast the first stone."
subject: Christ's mercy toward the woman caught in adultery
title: Christ and the Adulteress

caption: Raphael's The Transfiguration
description: Raphael's final masterpiece combines Christ's transfiguration on Mount Tabor with the healing of a possessed boy below.
subject: Transfiguration of Christ and healing of possessed boy
title: The Transfiguration

caption: The Last Supper by Juan de Juanes
description: Spanish Renaissance depiction of Christ instituting the Eucharist during the Last Supper with his apostles.
subject: Last Supper and Institution of the Eucharist
title: The Last Supper

caption: The Prayer of Jesus in Gethsemane by Alessandro Maganza
description: Depicts Jesus praying in anguish while disciples sleep, capturing the moment of spiritual struggle before His Passion.
subject: Christ's agony in the Garden of Gethsemane
title: The Prayer of Jesus in Gethsemane

caption: The Flagellation of Christ: Painting by Caravaggio
description: Intense Baroque depiction of Christ's suffering during scourging, emphasizing physical pain and divine submission.
subject: Christ being scourged at the pillar
title: The Flagellation of Christ

caption: Caravaggio's Ecce Homo - Behold The Man
description: Powerful portrayal of Christ after flagellation, presenting the suffering Messiah to the crowd with dramatic lighting.
subject: Pilate presenting the scourged Christ to the people
title: Ecce Homo

caption: The Lost Caravaggio - Ecce Homo
description: Recently rediscovered work depicting Christ's suffering humanity, showing the wounded Savior before crucifixion.
subject: Christ presented to the people after torture
title: Ecce Homo (disputed attribution)

caption: Christ carrying the Cross (1605) by Orazio Gentileschi
description: Intimate portrayal of Christ's painful journey to Golgotha, emphasizing the physical and spiritual burden of the cross.
subject: Christ bearing His cross to Calvary
title: Christ Carrying the Cross

caption: James Tissot's What Our Lord Saw From The Cross
description: Unique perspective showing the scene below the cross, including mourners and soldiers, from Christ's viewpoint.
original_title: Ce que voyait Notre-Seigneur sur la Croix
subject: The view from the cross during crucifixion
title: What Our Lord Saw from the Cross

caption: Caravaggio's The Incredulity of St. Thomas
description: Dramatic scene showing Thomas's doubt resolved by physically touching Christ's resurrection wounds.
subject: Thomas touching Christ's wounds after Resurrection
title: The Incredulity of Saint Thomas

caption: Ascension of the Lord by Bernardino Gandino
description: Depicts Christ ascending to heaven surrounded by angels, with apostles witnessing the glorious event below.
subject: Christ's ascension into heaven
title: Ascension of the Lord

caption: Pentecost by Titian
description: Majestic depiction of the Holy Spirit descending as tongues of fire upon the Virgin Mary and apostles.
mystery_name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
subject: Descent of the Holy Spirit upon the Apostles
title: Pentecost

caption: Fresco of Assumption of Our Lady in the Vision of St Bonaventure in the church Chiesa di Santa Lucia del Gonfalone by Cesare Mariani (1863)
description: Grand fresco showing Mary's bodily assumption into heaven, accompanied by angels and witnessed by saints.
location: Chiesa di Santa Lucia del Gonfalone, Rome
subject: Virgin Mary's assumption into heaven
title: Assumption of the Virgin with Vision of St. Bonaventure

caption: Coronation of the Virgin, fresco by Giuseppe Mattia Borgnis
description: Depicts the Virgin Mary being crowned as Queen of Heaven by Jesus Christ, surrounded by angels and saints.
subject: Mary's coronation as Queen of Heaven
title: Coronation of the Virgin

caption: Jan van Eyck's The Annunciation portrays the angel Gabriel announcing to Mary, who humbly accepts God's will
description: Shows the Archangel Gabriel announcing to Mary that she will bear the Son of God, with rich symbolic details.
location: National Gallery of Art, Washington D.C.
medium: Oil on canvas transferred from wood
subject: Angel Gabriel announcing Christ's birth to Virgin Mary
title: The Annunciation

caption: Basilica of the Visitation in Ein Karem, a village in the hill country of Judea where John the Baptist was born
description: Shows the meeting between Virgin Mary and her cousin Elizabeth, both miraculously pregnant with Jesus and John.
location: Basilica of the Visitation, Ein Karem
subject: Mary visiting Elizabeth
title: The Visitation

caption: Nativity with St. Francis and St. Lawrence by Caravaggio
description: Depicts the newborn Christ child with Virgin Mary, Joseph, and saints Francis and Lawrence in dramatic lighting.
original_title: Natività con i santi Francesco e Lorenzo
subject: Birth of Jesus with saints Francis and Lawrence
title: Nativity with St. Francis and St. Lawrence

caption: Simeon's Song of Praise by Arent de Gelder
description: Shows the elderly Simeon recognizing the infant Jesus as Messiah during presentation at Jerusalem Temple.
mystery_name: The Presentation of Jesus in the Temple
subject: Presentation of Jesus at the Temple
title: Simeon's Song of Praise

caption: Finding of the Savior in the Temple by William Holman Hunt
description: Depicts Jesus as a boy discussing scripture with rabbis in the Temple, while Mary and Joseph look on.
mystery_name: The Finding of Jesus in the Temple
subject: Twelve-year-old Jesus teaching in the Temple
title: The Finding of the Saviour in the Temple

caption: Apparition of the Messiah, an oil painting on canvas, measuring 540 cm × 750 cm, by Russian painter Alexander Andreyevich Ivanov (1806–1858)
description: Shows John the Baptist preaching and pointing to Christ approaching from distance, with diverse crowd reactions.
mystery_name: The Baptism of Jesus in the Jordan
subject: John the Baptist pointing to approaching Christ
title: The Appearance of Christ Before the People

caption: Wedding at Cana by Paolo Veronese
description: Depicts the wedding feast where Jesus performs his first miracle, transforming water into wine for guests.
subject: Christ's first miracle turning water into wine
title: The Wedding at Cana

caption: Christ in the Storm on the Sea of Galilee, a 1633 oil-on-canvas painting by the Dutch Golden Age painter Rembrandt van Rijn
description: Shows Jesus calming a violent storm while disciples panic, demonstrating his divine power over nature.
mystery_name: The Proclamation of the Kingdom of God
original_title: Christus in de storm op het meer van Galilea
subject: Jesus calming the storm on Galilee
title: The Storm on the Sea of Galilee

caption: The Savior's Transfiguration by Theophanes the Greek
description: Shows Jesus transfigured in divine light between Moses and Elijah, witnessed by Peter, James, and John.
subject: Christ's transfiguration on Mount Tabor
title: The Transfiguration

caption: Christ and the Disciples Before the Last Supper by Henry Ossawa Tanner
description: Tanner's intimate depiction shows Jesus preparing his disciples for the institution of the Eucharist, emphasizing spiritual preparation rather than the meal itself.
location: Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts, Philadelphia
subject: Jesus preparing his disciples for the Last Supper
title: Christ and the Disciples Before the Last Supper

caption: The Arrest of Christ Kiss of Judas by Giotto
description: Giotto's revolutionary fresco captures Judas's betrayal through a kiss, with emotional intensity and dramatic composition that broke from Byzantine tradition.
subject: Judas betraying Jesus with a kiss
title: The Arrest of Christ (Kiss of Judas)

caption: The Flagellation of Our Lord Jesus Christ by Bouguereau
description: Bouguereau's depiction shows Christ enduring the brutal scourging with serene dignity, emphasizing his sacrificial suffering through precise anatomical rendering.
subject: Christ being scourged at the pillar
title: The Flagellation of Our Lord Jesus Christ

caption: Van Dyck's _The Crowning with Thorns_ (early 17th century), a Baroque depiction of Christ's suffering and paradoxical triumph
description: Van Dyck's Baroque masterpiece depicts Christ's coronation with thorns as a paradoxical triumph, showing dignity amidst suffering through dramatic lighting.
subject: Roman soldiers mocking Jesus with a crown of thorns
title: The Crowning with Thorns

caption: Raphael's Christ Falls on the Way to Calvary, a painting depicting Christ stumbling under the cross with Mary and a crowd witnessing
description: Raphael depicts Christ's third fall with Mary witnessing, combining dramatic emotion with classical harmony and balanced composition.
subject: Christ's third fall under the weight of the cross
title: Christ Falls on the Way to Calvary

caption: The Descent from the Cross (1616-1617) by Rubens: A dynamic, dramatic depiction of Christ's descent
description: Rubens' Baroque masterpiece shows the dramatic moment of Christ's descent with dynamic composition and emotional intensity.
subject: The lowering of Christ's body from the cross
title: The Descent from the Cross

caption: The Three Marys at the Tomb by Annibale Carracci, 17th century at Hermitage Museum, reveals Baroque vividness and drama
description: Carracci depicts the moment of resurrection discovery with dramatic lighting and emotional intensity, capturing the women's awe and wonder.
subject: The three Marys discovering the empty tomb of Christ
title: Holy Women at Christ's Tomb

caption: Christ Taking Leave of the Apostles by Duccio, 14th century, Museo dell'Opera, tempera on wood, Gothic details
description: Duccio's Gothic masterpiece shows Christ commissioning his apostles before ascension, featuring gold background and Byzantine influence.
subject: Christ's post-resurrection appearance and commissioning of apostles
title: Appearance on the Mountain in Galilee

caption: Simone Peterzano's Pentecost depicts the Virgin and disciples receiving the Holy Spirit in Mannerist style
description: Peterzano's Mannerist interpretation shows dramatic spiritual transformation with elongated figures and vibrant color contrasts.
mystery_name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
subject: The descent of the Holy Spirit upon the apostles and Mary
title: Pentecost

caption: The Divine Exchange Between Mother and Son
description: Gothic stained glass window depicting Mary's assumption into heaven, symbolizing her special role in salvation history.
subject: The bodily assumption of Mary into heaven
title: The Assumption of Mary

caption: Mary, Help of Christians by Giuseppe Rollini
description: Baroque-style fresco depicting Mary as protectress of Christians, holding the Child Jesus while extending her mantle in a gesture of maternal protection and intercession.
subject: Virgin Mary as protector and intercessor for Christians
title: Mary, Help of Christians
